name: Offbeat Soccer Post Game Jam
description:
This is Post Game Jam Version of LDJAM 41
You can find original gameJam entry here: https://samuelparera.itch.io/offbeat-soccer
GameJam Entry : https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/41/football-shooter


Game Concept:  We created a fun football game where the player has to shoot a goal using weapons rather than kicking it with his/her feet. This game is a combination of shooter + sports genre. Play against AI and try to score more goals than the AI.

Game Mechanics:  Use WASD to move the character in all directions.  Press shift to run. Use “Q” & “E” to place Mine & throw Grenade

Use weapons to shoot the ball in the opponent’s goal post and use mines and grenades to deviate the path of the ball.

NOTE: The disclaimer is present in the build.
